attributes.action: Give police more authority to deal with online harassment and cyber bulling
attributes.additional_details: Because apparently its not illegal to slander and definate someone's character and police are powerless despite having a massive impact on family's
attributes.background: We want to police to be able to do more with perpetrators not just be able to warn them!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311738
